entry.title: nodebysam/TestLab.js: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!
entry.content: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!

entry.title: lit/lit: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.
entry.content: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.

entry.title: fcrfabiano/Drag-and-Drop: The Drag and Drop API is a lightweight and customizable library that enables developers to easily implement drag-and-drop functionality within web applications. It simplifies the process of making elements draggable and droppable, supporting a variety of use cases such as sortable lists, file uploads, and UI components management.
entry.content: The Drag and Drop API is a lightweight and customizable library that enables developers to easily implement drag-and-drop functionality within web applications. It simplifies the process of making elements draggable and droppable, supporting a variety of use cases such as sortable lists, file uploads, and UI components management.

entry.title: gambjonny/urrepo: A lightweight monorepo template that prioritizes clarity and flexibility over abstraction.
entry.content: A lightweight monorepo template that prioritizes clarity and flexibility over abstraction.

entry.title: nigrosimone/turbo-array: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.
entry.content: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.

entry.title: C-Teo/minerva: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
entry.content: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.

entry.title: Micropue/micropueUI: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.
entry.content: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.

entry.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
entry.content: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
entry.content: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
